casebody.data:
George W. BALDWIN
v.
Michale J. LAMM Superintendent, et al. No. 47P02-9. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. George W. Baldwin, Pro Se. Elizabeth F. Parsons, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd day of September 2008 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of December 2008."
